content: ***find this pattern as a free download from hobbii on september 1 2023*** indulge in the delicate balance of color and texture found in the open book wrap pairing classic granny stripes with structured popcorn stitches this oversized triangle scarf will be by your side through autumn strolls and marathon reading sessions play with your color palette to change the vibe but be sure your border color has a strong contrast to the overall color scheme add or remove sections as you please to customize the size of your shawl **yarn used ** hobbii happy place dk weight #3 50% wool 50% cotton 273 yards per 100g skein a 32 melange 210 yards 1 skein b 06 melange 120 yards 1 skein c 29 melange 145 yards 1 skein d 22 melange 160 yards 1 skein e 01 melange 175 yards 1 skein mc 34 solid 500 yards 2 skeins join the happy place vip email list for exclusive details deals and giveaways - link 1 1 https //link brands mvk co/ac5f8e7
